titleStmt.title: The charge given by Sr. William Smith, Brt. at the quarter-sessions of the peace held for the county of Middlesex, at Westminster, on Monday the 24th of April, 1682.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (Middlesex)
Smith, William, Sir, 1616 or 17-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
